{{*mp|April 9}} At least 37 people are killed and 850 are injured when a 6.3-[[moment magnitude scale|magnitude]] '''[[2013 Bushehr earthquake|earthquake]]''' strikes the Iranian province of [[Bushehr Province|Bushehr]].

  +
{{*mp|April 9}} A gunman kills 13 people in '''[[Velika Ivanča shooting|a spree shooting]]''' in the village of [[Velika Ivanča]], Serbia.
   
 
</ul>
  
</ul>
